title: [Large-scale] Web-Based Elementary Science Instructional Design Intensive Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of elementary science curriculum and web-based learning tools proficiency
context.additional_context: Web-based instructional design competency development program for strengthening science subject-matter expertise

learning_goals: One can create a web-based elementary science lesson design document with three or more phases using the ADDIE model.
One can develop an LMS-based science education module incorporating interactive elements (quizzes, discussion boards, etc.).
One can propose a method to measure learner engagement by applying a project-based assessment system.

resources: LMS Platforms (Zoom Webinar, Google Classroom, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
